MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CancelAsync(object userState) cil managed

Docs.param: A user specified state object that is passed to the method or one of the methods. It identifies the pending asynchronous operation to cancel.
Docs.summary: Cancels a pending asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks An <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> is thrown if `userState` is `null`. If multiple <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClient.FindAsync%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClient.ResolveAsync%2A> operations are called with the same `userState` value, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClient.CancelAsync%2A> is called with that `userState` value, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.

Docs.summary: Occurs when the entire find operation completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property contains information about all matching services. For more information about this event, see [Asynchronous Find](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/asynchronous-find-sample.md).

Public Event FindProgressChanged As EventHandler(Of FindProgressChangedEventArgs)

Docs.summary: Occurs every time the client receives a response from a particular service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This event is useful if you are processing the results as they arrive. For more information about this event, see [Asynchronous Find](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/asynchronous-find-sample.md).

Docs.summary: Begins an asynchronous find task operation.
